categories.name: General Job Boards
categories.description: High-volume, broad-market job aggregators. Good for market scanning and keyword alerts.

sites.name: LinkedIn
sites.notes: Strong networking signal; recruiter visibility matters as much as applications.

sites.name: Indeed
sites.notes: Largest aggregator; many reposts from ATS systems.

sites.name: Glassdoor
sites.notes: Useful when combined with company reviews and salary data.

sites.name: ZipRecruiter
sites.notes: Good alerting, recruiter-driven outreach.

sites.name: Wellfound (AngelList Talent)
sites.notes: Startups, equity-heavy comp, early to mid-stage companies.

sites.name: Stack Overflow Jobs
sites.notes: Developer-centric roles; fewer but higher-signal listings.

sites.name: Dice
sites.notes: Strong for contract, enterprise tech, and legacy stacks.

sites.name: Built In
sites.notes: Tech companies by metro and remote.

sites.name: Hacker News â€“ Who Is Hiring
sites.notes: Monthly thread; informal but very high quality.

sites.name: Levels.fyi Jobs
sites.notes: Comp-transparent listings; mostly mid-to-senior roles.

sites.name: Remote OK
sites.notes: Startup-heavy, global listings.

sites.name: We Work Remotely
sites.notes: High-quality remote-only postings.

sites.name: FlexJobs
sites.notes: Curated and vetted; paid access.

sites.name: Remote.co
sites.notes: Smaller but cleaner listings.

categories.name: Company Career Pages
categories.description: Direct employer applications; lowest duplication and highest ATS fidelity.

sites.name: Greenhouse Job Boards
sites.notes: Common ATS for tech and growth-stage companies.

sites.name: Classroom Mosaic Jobs
sites.notes: Direct career listings for roles at Classroom Mosaic (e.g., engineering, client success) powered by Polymer ATS.

sites.name: Southeastern Freight Lines
sites.notes: Official job portal for Southeastern Freight Lines, listing roles from driver to operations and administrative positions.

sites.name: Softdocs
sites.notes: Official Softdocs job board listing open positions at the company.

sites.name: Find Great People (FGP)
sites.notes: Recruiting firm job search portal with listings across contract, direct hire, and staffing roles.

categories.name: Government & Public Sector
categories.description: Federal, state, and local government roles.

sites.name: South Carolina State Careers
sites.notes: Official statewide job portal for South Carolina government employment.

categories.name: Nonprofit & Mission-Driven
categories.description: Education, nonprofit, and social impact organizations.
